Other

Supplier Agreement

As part of our Quality System, The Company has certain requirements from suppliers.
Laboratory services will be done as follow:

-  All analysis will have an identification code.
-  Analysis will be only done by trained and competent personnel.
-

The laboratory shall have ISO 17025 accreditation or operate in accordance with its requirements.

The following documents are required for all the equipment delivered to The Company:

-  Analysis certificate on time.

I……………………………………………, as the representative of this supplier, hereby declare the above information to be
accurate and I agree to supply The Company with all required documentation.
